T02D2397:25a-0: @25a * // so ma s'ur+ya bandha no p'a ya na ma /
T02D2397:25a-2: nyi zla bcing pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2397:25a-3: yum don grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2397:25a-4: dge 'dun rnams kyi yon tan brjod mi shes pa yi //
T02D2397:25a-5: gand'i'i sgra brdungs skyon smras phyi rol dag tu bskrad //
T02D2397:25a-6: chu yi steng gshegs me tog len ci chu yi gting mi 'bying //
T02D2397:25a-7: ngo mtshar phul du byung ba'i pi r'u pa zhes grags //
T02D2397:25a-8: tshong 'dus srang du 'khyam zhing zas kyi lhag ma za //
T02D2397:25a-9: yud tsam khros pas gangg'a'i chu rgyun gyen la bzlog //
T02D2397:25a-10: chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'byang //
T02D2397:25a-11: yon tan phul du byung ba'i bi r'u pa zhes grags //
T02D2397:25a-12: chang tshong dag la khro bar mi byed nyi ma ni //
T02D2397:25a-13: khyod kyi khang par gta' mar bzhag ces smras te 'dug //
T02D2397:25a-14: chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying //
T02D2397:25a-15: ngo mtshar phul du byung pa'i birwa pa zhes grags //
T02D2397:25a-16: mu stegs rten la spyan zur gcig pas lingga gas //
T02D2397:25a-17: de mthong khyab mjug lha yi rten de aandha 'dar //
T02D2397:25a-18: nyi ma gta' mar bcug nas chang 'thung bi r'u pa //
T02D2397:25a-19: 'jig rten rnams ni phyugs 'dra bi r'u pa zhes brjod //
T02D2397:25a-20: lhan cig skyes pa'i sems nyid phra zhing dri ma med //
T02D2397:25a-21: chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying//
T02D2397:25a-22: ngo mtshar phul du byung ba'i bi r'u pa zhes grags //
T02D2397:25a-23: nyi zla bcing ba'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon
